articles.title: Apple's AI spike sparks rally in Asian suppliers By Investing.com - Investing.com
articles.description: Apple’s AI spike sparks rally in Asian suppliers
articles.content: Investing.com-- Asian suppliers of Apple Inc (NASDAQ:AAPL) rose sharply on Thursday, tracking sharp gains in the iPhone maker this week after it unveiled a slew of artificial intelligence features fo… [+1702 chars]
